resources.string: This is the main page of the application, where you can access other activities while having access to the menu. At the top, you can see a toolbar with three buttons. The house will remove any activity on the screen, the profil icon will open your user information and, of course, the question mark will open this help page. You can also access this menu with its meaning with the button on the left. At the bottom, each icon represent and activity. The one on the left is the current news, that you can click to see more details or you can click on the save button to save it on your account. the middle icon is your saved news that you can also click for more details and remove them of your list if you want. The right icon is this app settings (colors, etcâ€¦).
